name: WP Sounds
author: Chevi

sections.description: The WP Sounds plugin allows you to easily insert sound buttons in your entries, from a big list of available sounds. Simple put the sound name between : and : to insert it.
sections.installation:
Installation is very simple, all you have to do is:

  1. Upload wp-sounds.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Done!
sections.faq:
Can I add more sounds?

No, we add more sounds with every update of the plugin

Can I disable sounds in comments?

As of version 1 that is not possible. If enough people download and install the plugin we might consider adding some configuration options to it.

short_description: Insert cool sound buttons in your entries and allow your readers to do so in the comments as well
description: The WP Sounds plugin allows you to easily insert sound buttons in your entries, from a big list of available sounds. Simple put the sound name between : and : to insert it.
